text: Pentagonia peruviana is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. ==Sources== * Jaramillo, T., Cornejo, X. & Pitman, N. 2004. Pentagonia peruviana. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. peruviana Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Critically endangered flora of South America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Pentagonia peruviana
